org.exist.xquery.value
Interface NodeValue

All Superinterfaces:
Item, Sequence
All Known Implementing Classes:
AttributeImpl, CDATASectionImpl, CommentImpl, DocumentImpl, ElementImpl, NamespaceNode, NodeImpl, NodeProxy, ProcessingInstructionImpl, ReferenceNode, TextImpl
public interface NodeValue
extends Item, Sequence

Represents a node value. May either be an in-memory node or a persistent node.

Author:
Wolfgang Meier (wolfgang@exist-db.org)
